articles.title: Apple shares rise as sales fall less than feared despite China decline - Financial Times
articles.description: Tech giant announces $110bn in share buybacks and raises quarterly dividend by 4%

articles.title: A 2019 email from Microsoft's CTO to CEO Satya Nadella and Bill Gates shows how spooked the company was by AI rivals Google and OpenAI - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: “I was highly dismissive of their efforts. That was a mistake,” Microsoft chief technology officer Kevin Scott said at the time.
articles.content:
In 2019, Microsoft executives at the highest level had an anxious email exchange about AI that would ultimately kick-start its AI investment.

articles.author: Sunil Shankar Matkar
articles.title: Technical View: Nifty may consolidate further with support at 22,500, India VIX up 32% in 6 days - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The volatility maintained northward journey for sixth consecutive session, which may put the bulls at uncomfortable position. The India VIX, the fear gauge, rallied 4.5 percent to 13.45 levels, taking total six-day gains to 32 percent.
